Class CallingStarter

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.CallingStarter

  • class CallingStarter
extends java.lang.Object
    Fires when "Call" button is pressed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CallingStarter

        CallingStarter(User user,
               boolean endCall)
        Receives the name and status of the call. Will start or end a call depending on endCall.
        Parameters:
        user - The username of the person currently selected
        endCall - Whether we should end the call instead of starting one.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        void actionPerformed()
        Runs when the ActionListener on the "Call" button is pressed.

      • callSocket

        private java.net.Socket callSocket(boolean withServer)
        Set up socket to actually send, using serverIP if server or individual IP if not.
        Parameters:
        withServer - Whether to use the proxy server to connect through,
        Returns:
        The Socket to use with the send Thread, or null if nobody picks up.
